preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 40 g of silver (Ag) and place it in a clean mixing container. 
 2. Measure 64 g of selenium (Se) and add it to the container with Ag. 
 3. Measure 12 g of silicon (Si) and add it to the mixture. 
 4. Measure 36 g of thallium (Tl) and add it to the mixing container. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until a uniform mixture is achieved.
